group_1.narration: "Phantom Thief Magical Kirin"@has always been my favorite manga.
It's a story about how Magical Kirin@steals a bunch of magical artifacts that@were scattered around the world, all @while battling demons and ghouls.
She fights to the bitter end, all by@herself, to bring happiness to all...
I looked up to her and wanted to be just@like her... I made Magical Kirin my goal.
But I didn't bring happiness to anyone...

group_1.textRight: You're responsible for indirectly trying@to kill other Magical Girls.

group_1.textLeft: No! No way! It's not the same!

group_1.textRight: If you want to prove me wrong, then stop@relying on other people's hard work.
Earn things through your own efforts, then@share them with the people around you.
Hmm, this time, I, Alina, find your manga@to be...rather interesting...
The art...
It's as bad as usual. [chara:100801:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100801:cheek_0][chara:100801:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:100801:lipSynch_1]However, I did enjoy@the progression of the plot.
It's not my field, so perhaps I am mistaken,@but your troubled heroine is very good.
How shall I put it... She@feels...authentic.
Though perhaps it's too early to say that.

group_1.textLeft: Alina-senpai, I don't really understand...@What part did you like?

group_1.textRight: What I'm saying is that the main character@is struggling, but trying to progress.
I struggled to give dimension to my paintings@and drawings.
But I learned through that struggle.
And as my technique developed, I was able@to open up a whole new world for myself.
This heroine is doing the same, no? She is@trying to open doors, to innovate herself.

group_1.textLeft: She's really uncertain right now... [chara:101201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101201:cheek_0][chara:101201:face_mtn_ex_040.exp.json][chara:101201:lipSynch_1]Do you@mean that uncertainty will help her grow?

group_1.textRight: I think that regular old "growth" is possible@at any time.
But if you wish to revolutionize something,@you need a great upheaval. A trigger.
Capito?

group_1.narration: The main character of the manga I'm@drawing right now... She's based on me.
So the uncertainty she's feeling is mine...@Does that mean I can change?
It feels like I'm just wallowing@in all the things I regret doing...

group_1.textRight: Hi, Grandma.

group_1.textLeft: Did you read the new Magical Kirin?

group_1.textRight: No...

group_1.textLeft: But I'm dying to talk all about it with you!

group_1.narration: Magical Kirin saves people with her@own power, without bothering others.@Phantom Thief Karin, on the other hand,@kills someone to save someone else.
How am I supposed to carry on my@work as a Magical Girl knowing that...

group_1.textLeft: Karin, is something bothering you? Why@don't you try talking it through with me?
I know what you're thinking, but...
Your old grandma has been around the@block a few times.
I've fought and argued, I've been sick and@poor, and I've struggled to make ends meet!
I've been through all kinds of awful things.@So why not tell me what's bothering you?
This time, Grandma will be the one@rescuing you, Karin.

group_1.textRight: Thanks so much, [chara:101201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101201:cheek_0][chara:101201:face_mtn_ex_040.exp.json][chara:101201:lipSynch_1]but...I'm fine, really.
